properties.areaDesc: Interior Waldo; Knox; Kennebec; Southern Franklin; Sagadahoc; Lincoln; Southern Somerset; Androscoggin; Coastal Waldo
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:16AM EST until January 19 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
...SNOW EXPECTED LATE TODAY INTO SUNDAY MORNING...

low pressure moving out of the Great Lakes region will spread
snow into the area. The snow could be heavy at times, mainly
this evening. The will taper off to snow showers from west to east
late tonight through Sunday morning.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6
inches expected.

* WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest and western Maine.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of heavy snow possible tonight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to
www.weather.gov/gray..

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SUNDAY
